001package gbw.melange.common.shading.services;
002
003import com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle;
004import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color;
005import com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture;
006import gbw.melange.common.shading.IManagedShader;
007import gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.IBlindShader;
008import gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.ITexturedShader;
009import gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.checker.ICheckerBuilder;
010import gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.noise.IPerlinFragmentBuilder;
011import gbw.melange.common.shading.components.IFragmentShader;
012import gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.gradients.IGradientBuilder;
013import gbw.melange.common.shading.generative.voronoi.IVoronoiFragmentBuilder;
014import gbw.melange.common.shading.postprocess.IBoxBlurShader;
015
016/**
017 * Spring-distributed entry point for the melange colors api.
018 * Allows for quick and easy configuration of procedural shaders.
019 *
020 * @author GustavBW
021 * @version $Id: $Id
022 */
023public interface Colors {
024
025    IManagedShader<?> constant(Color color);
026    ITexturedShader image(FileHandle src) throws Exception;
027    ITexturedShader image(Texture src);
028    IGradientBuilder linearGradient();
029    IGradientBuilder radialGradient();
030    ICheckerBuilder checker();
031    IVoronoiFragmentBuilder voronoi();
032    IPerlinFragmentBuilder perlin();
033
034    IBlindShader fromFragment(IFragmentShader fragmentShader);
035
036    //Maybe break post processes out into separate Effects api - although shader graphs will make that redundant
037    IBoxBlurShader blur(int kernelSize);
038}
